title: 一齊入嚟幫下李智誠同學

replies.msg:
Situation
You are Li Chi Shing, a top-up degree student studying BBA at the PolyU SPEED. You are trying to save yourself from academic dishonesty accusations, possible fraud charges and a possible breakup with your girlfriend.

Task 1
Write a letter to the Student Discipline Committee to defend yourself from academic dishonesty accusations regarding your company law essay, write about 200 words.

Task 2
Write an email to the Student Finance Office, WFSFAA to explain that everything was your mother's fault and you are not responsible for anything at all. Write about 150 words.

Task 3
Your girlfriend is thinking of breaking up with you because you are idiotic, naive and irresponsible. She is now hanging out with Kelvin, one of your schoolmates. Write a letter to threaten Kelvin and ask him to stay away from your girlfriend. Write about 200 words.

This is a work of fiction. Any resemblance to actual persons, living or dead, or actual events is purely coincidental and would be a shame if they resembles to any actual events.
